name: directoryCreate
description: Creates an on-disk or in-memory directory in the specified path

params.name: path
params.description: Absolute path of the directory to be created. Alternatively, you can specify an IP address, as in the following example: `DirectoryCreate("//12.3.123.123/c_drive/test". NOTE: You have to have the required permissions to run this function.`);

params.name: createPath
params.description: Lucee Only. Create parent directory when it doesn't exist.

params.name: ignoreExists
params.description: Pass false (default) to throw an error if the directory already exists, or true to skip the create operation without an error.

examples.title: Script Syntax
examples.description: Checking if a directory called 'icons' exists and then creating the directory if it does not exist.
examples.result: The directory 'icons' will be created under the img folder.
